Description: Pomegranate pendant: from a heavy loop in opaque black glass a pomegranate, inverted, is pendent. It is of the same glass as the loop. A thick thread, in part in relief, of turquoise-blue glass zigzags around the body. No foliations have been distinguished.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: Sale Catalogue, Giovanni d’Athanasi Collection, Sotheby, London, 5 March 1836 and again on 13-20 March 1837, lot 748.
